main event: Multiple unidentified flying objects were sighted over Burley and Fern, Idaho on July 23, 1952, moving very fast from north to south.
interesting points: Witnesses observed three circular objects that were light yellowish-white and moving in a V formation,The objects were reported to be about three times their length, trailing a tail of flame,The sighting lasted approximately 15 to 30 minutes,Clear weather conditions were reported at the time with 30 miles visibility,Several witnesses including civilians and a policeman observed the objects.
